sentences.en: Bilingual, typing 60 wpm, shorthand 90 wpm, dictaphone essential.
sentences.cn: 须掌握两种语言, 打字每分钟60字, 速记每分钟90字,且熟悉根据录入整理文字.

sentences.en: I suspected the existence of a dictaphone somewhere in his panelled rooms.
sentences.cn: 我还疑心说不定在他装有镶板的什么地方,还会藏着一部口述留声机哩.

sentences.en: I vainly tried to record it on my Dictaphone, at the match.
sentences.cn: 观看比赛时,我徒劳地试图用录音电话把它记录下来.

sentences.en: I was using a dictaphone to record the conversation.
sentences.cn: 我用的是口述录音机来记录对话.

sentences.en: Now you receive three applications instead of one: dictaphone, phone calls recorder and music player!
sentences.cn: 现在您已经拥有了一种三合一的软件了: 录音机, 通话录音机和音乐播放器!
她对着录音电话机狂喊一通.

words.tran_cn: 录音机；口授留声机；录音电话机

trans.tran_en: a tape recorder designed for recording dictation and later reproducing it for typing
